title: Cranberry, orange and walnut oatmeal cookies
ingredients: ['100g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '115g light muscovado sugar', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tablespoon orange juice', '150g self-raising flour', '100g rolled oats', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '150g dried cranberries', '50g chopped walnuts']
